WorkItem.Description:
I posted this some time ago in discussion but without any response. It seem it's a bug.
 
I'm trying to remove some rows with merged cells and i can't get it right.
 
It looks like merged cells don't get removed (I know merged cells are in separated array). Also data in cell get messed up (it removes some data I didn't want to be removed)
 
I'm using Excel2007 for reading and writing and PHPExcel 1.7.6
 
More details with screenshots at http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/discussions/260613

Comments.Message:
Any updated to this issue?

I also got this problem as of today, please find attached my screenshot here.
I just deleted four rows in which there are merged cells, but the merged cells was keep there, I've tried delete the row one at a time but problem still exists.
